name: Car Chase (Jan_Hunter)
description:
This game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
About:
the game about: police chase you and you have to escape and survive for the longest time
Controller:
WASD for Moving
Team:
Developer and design: Me(Jan_Huner)
Game Teaster: Andy_Hunter

Challenge:
1- get 50 cions in one match
2- get a score of 15 in the first minute
3- Get the Last Car


Thanks for playing my game :)
